channel.title: Spring JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [DATAREST-254] org.springframework.data.rest.webmvc.json.PersistentEntityJackson2Module does not properly handle JPA @Transient annotation during serialization yeilding a NPE
item.description:
Create and Entity as per below:

@Entity
@Table(name = "category")
public class Category implements Serializable {

@Id
@GeneratedValue(strategy = GenerationType.AUTO)
protected Long id;

@Column(name = "description")
protected String description;

@Column(name="last_change_dtm")
private Date lastChangeDate;

@Transient
private Long key;

...
}

Method org.springframework.data.rest.webmvc.json.PersistentEntityJackson2Module.updateBuilder(SerializationConfig config, BeanDescription beanDesc, BeanSerializerBuilder builder) with throw a NullPointerException when trying to serialize the key property of Category bean. Within the for loop, @Transient properties will result in a null persistentProperty and the subsequent if() statement will throw a NPE. This did not occur in Spring Data Rest 2.0.0.RC1.
item.environment: OS X Mavericks, Oracle JDK 1.7.0_51, Apache Tomcat 7.0.47, Spring Data Rest 2.0.0.RELEASE, Jackson Data Bind 2.3.1, Spring Framework 3.2.7.RELEASE, Hibernate JPA 2.0 API
item.summary: org.springframework.data.rest.webmvc.json.PersistentEntityJackson2Module does not properly handle JPA @Transient annotation during serialization yeilding a NPE

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Forgot to mention, expose the Category bean as a CrudRepository and attempt to fetch categories.

public interface CategoryRepository extends CrudRepository<Category, Long> {
}

Stack trace:

Hibernate: select category0_.id as id1_0_, category0_.description as descript2_0_, category0_.last_change_dtm as last_cha3_0_ from category category0_

The root cause for this is DATAREST-253 and what you see eventually is the exception failing to be handled.

I'll keep this one around for the fox for the latter.
